entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain changing to periods of rain in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then southwest 40 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
